Study Title: APL93: Timing of CxT and Role of Maintenance
Brief Summary: Objectives of the trial were to assess the optimal timing of chemotherapy with or after ATRA and the role of maintenance therapy.
Interventions: DRUG: ATRA|DRUG: ATRA and or Chemo as maintenance
Primary Outcome Measures: For induction treatment event-free survival (EFS), calculated from the date of randomization, was the major endpoint., 2 years
Sponsor: Groupe d'etude et de travail sur les leucemies aigues promyelocytaires
Study Design: Allocation: RANDOMIZED|Intervention Model: PARALLEL|Masking: NONE|Primary Purpose: TREATMENT
